org.logl.logl

Interface AdjustableLoggerProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LoggerProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface AdjustableLoggerProvider
extends LoggerProvider
    A LoggerProvider that provides AdjustableLogger instances.
